data.text:
OPEN TODAY:

Monday: Aug. 5th. We are still being hit by the rain bands from Hurricane Debbie.

But I am at the store today. If you need to come by, we are open!

Thank You: Jim

Store Hours: Monday – Friday: 9:30-6:00 Saturday: 9:30-3:00, Sunday: Closed

CLOSED: New Years Day, Chasco Street Parade Day (usually in March), Memorial Day, July 4th, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas Day

5405 Main Street (2/3 Block East of U.S. 19)

New Port Richey, FL 34652

phone (727) 844-0904

E-Mail: jim@pascocamera.com

We are your local camera and photographic equipment specialty store. We stock Canon, Nikon and Sony Cameras, Lenses and Flashes. We also stock Sigma & Tamron Lenses. As well as equipment, we also offer video transfer services and specialty photographic services.

You are welcome to call and check on availability of the items y0u are looking for before coming in to visit us. 727-844-0904. Thank you.

————————————————————————

VIDEO TRANSFERS: If you have some family video tapes and want to transfer them to DVDs, now would be a great time to bring them into us. It only takes a few minutes to drop them off and we’ll have most orders completed within a week to 10 days. It will also help keep us working during this slow time.

We look forward to helping you!

Jim & Annette

In case you missed it, here is the Channel 13 News Story about Pasco Camera and Digital Cameras from April 2023

https://www.fox13news.com/news/handful-of-shops-keep-old-school-camera-hobbies-alive-for-enthusiasts

Pasco Camera Exchange, Video in 40 seconds:

New YouTube Video

Pasco Camera Exchange

Tampa Bay’s Camera Store.

What a great job! I get to help people find cameras and other photo accessories that will help solve their photographic needs.

And I’m able to do this at prices competitive with the big box stores. If that’s the kind of sales help you like, see me!

This website contains just a small selection of the items we stock.

We have over 2500 items in stock, including camera bags, darkroom supplies, and other photo accessories.

If you don’t see what you’re looking for,

Please send us a Message or feel free to Call Us at (727) 844-0904

We accept: Cash, MasterCard, Visa, Discover, & American Express.

We do attempt to keep the website up to date, but we are not always able to stay current and prices may change. Please check with us for current prices and availability!

Click here and like us on Facebook: Pasco Camera Exchange on Facebook

CUSTOMER REVIEWS! Many people have come in recently and told us that they were there because of the good reviews we have received online. Thank you to everyone who has spoken well of us. If you you would like to give us good review, visit the following links:

YellowPages.com

Facebook

Thank You for 29 Wonderful Years!

1995 – 2024
